snippet.title: Frenzy - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam Re-Release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983, this was one of the very earliest releases from Ocean Software, then known as Spectrum Games, which would go on to be one of Europe's biggest game developers and publishers of the 1980s/90s. Frenzy is a simple riff on Berzerk, released for the ZX Spectrum.

Footage from the Steam re-release by Pixel Games UK

#zxspectrum #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #ocean #oceansoftware  #frenzy #sinclairzxspectrum
